channel.title: [317] shop help plz [317]
channel.description:
Hi can somebody please tell me how to make shop's on a 317 because currently in my hops.Cfg all i have is..This.
//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount-- [ENDOFSHOPLIST]
but a lot more of "Item----Amount--" Please can somebody explain to me how i can make a shop and the format to use when making one..If possible could someone make one called varrock general store that sell's these items... Item name item id amount Tinderbox 590 10 iron axe 1349 10 bronze arrows 882 10000 chisel 1755 10 hammer 2347 10 This would be much appreicated...Please can someone help
